body:
We are working on these bugs. Since they are non-deterministic concurrency
bugs we are building tools to help us. In fact it was one of these tools
that reported this error. This note is to just assure you that we are aware
of the issue and working hard on it.

On Sat, Jan 3, 2015 at 11:54 PM, Burcu Dogan <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Happened for CC_FOR_TARGET=$NDK_ROOT/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-gcc
> GOOS=android GOARCH=arm GOARM=7 ./make.bash
>
> See
> https://registry.hub.docker.com/u/golang/mobile/build_id/32290/code/b6bkeghtevzgoeae8v9vhpp/
>
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/9225#issuecomment-68621118>.
>
